gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.CmdLineSyntax

Class OptionUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.CmdLineSyntax.OptionUtility

  • public class OptionUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility functions for Option operations.

    History:

    • SCR-11, chlu, 06-04-12, Fixed compile error due to JDK upgrade
    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team

      • ConvertName

        public static java.lang.String ConvertName(java.lang.String optionStr,
                                           Option systemOption,
                                           boolean fullNameFlag)
        Convert between full name and short name for a given option string
        Parameters:
        optionStr - option to be convert in a string format
        systemOption - system option which the convertion is based on
        fullNameFlag - boolean flag for full name if true, convert to full name for option string if false, convert to name for option string
        Returns:
        option in string format

                                       Option systemOption,
                                       boolean fullNameFlag)
        Get the optionItem from an given inputItem by specifying the known name
        Parameters:
        inputItem - the input option item for retrieving
        systemOption - system option which the operation is based on
        fullNameFlag - boolean flag for full name if true, convert to full name for option string if false, convert to name for option string
        Returns:
        option item
